Detailed Description

The TTSymbol class is used to represent a string and efficiently pass and compare that string.

At the moment the implementation is somewhat crude and really slow and it should be improved in the future.

This constructor is intended only for use by the TTSymbolTable object when creating new symbols in the table.

Perhaps this could be made private and then the class made a friend...
